long_description: The Sherpani Zoom shoulder bag is a fun and functional way to carry your stuff for a casual day out. Zippered main compartment stows daily essentials and includes a zip stash pocket; key tether secures car keys. Exterior pockets include a small zip-close pocket, stash pocket and a drop-in pocket with magnetic closure. Adjustable shoulder strap allows you to wear bag across your body or over your shoulder. Made of a soft and durable cotton/poly fabric blend. Contrast stitching and zipper pulls, and brushed metal buckles add style to the Sherpani Zooma shoulder bag.
short_description: The Sherpani Zoom shoulder bag is a fun and functional way to carry your stuff for a casual day out.
